response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. We believe it has the potential to significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $18,000 for this exceptional product. This price reflects not only the cost of production and development but also the unique advantages it brings to you. We are confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 18000}
